title: log backup failed when use GCS as external storage
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

master

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

linux

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

start log backup with GCS storage

### What did you expect?

log backup task status is normal

### What did happened?

log backup task status is **error**

comments_data.body:
@WangLe1321: These labels are not set on the issue: `severity/may-affects-5.0, severity/may-affects-5.1`.

<details>

In response to [this](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/issues/13106#issuecomment-1192291236):

>/remove-severity may-affects-5.0 may-affects-5.1


Instructions for interacting with me using PR comments are available [here](https://prow.tidb.io/command-help).  If you have questions or suggestions related to my behavior, please file an issue against the [ti-community-infra/tichi](https://github.com/ti-community-infra/tichi/issues/new?title=Prow%20issue:) repository.
</details>
